name: UFGResourceDescriptor
comment: Copyright 2016 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

methods.name: CanBeHandMined
methods.comment: The static mesh we want the ResourceNode to use when it has this class selected

methods.name: GetDepositMaterial
methods.comment: Returns the material this resource deposit use (if any)

methods.name: GetDepositMesh
methods.comment: The static mesh we want the Resource Deposit to use when it has this class selected

methods.name: GetDecalMaterial
methods.comment: Returns the decal this resource use (if any)

methods.name: GetDecalSize
methods.comment: If we are using a decal, then this returns how big that decal should be

methods.name: GetPingColor
methods.comment:
@todo This may not be the best place but break it out if there is a need for it.
The color the ping should have for this material

methods.name: GetCollectSpeedMultiplier
methods.comment: A multiplier for this resource to set if it is fast or slow to pick up. 1.0 = normal

methods.name: GetCompasTexture
methods.comment: Texture to show in the compass when this resource has been scanned and found.

methods.name: GetDestroyedParticle
methods.comment: Gets particle for when node gets destroyed

methods.name: GetManualMiningAudioName
methods.comment: Gets name used in audio event for mining manually

methods.name: PostEditChangeProperty
methods.comment: When this is changed in the editor, propagate the changes to the preview window

properties.name: mDepositMesh
properties.comment: The static mesh we want the Resource Deposit to use when it has this class selected

properties.name: mDepositMaterial
properties.comment: The material this resource deposit use (if any)

properties.name: mDecalMaterial
properties.comment: The decal this resource use (if any)

properties.name: mDecalSize
properties.comment: How big will the decal on the ground be (and the collision for it) if we have mUseMaterialDecal enabled

properties.name: mPingColor
properties.comment:
@todo This may not be the best place but break it out if there is a need for it.
The color the ping should have for this material

properties.name: mCollectSpeedMultiplier
properties.comment: A multiplier for this resource to set if it is fast or slow to pick up. 1.0 = normal

properties.name: mCompassTexture
properties.comment: Texture to show in the compass when this resource has been scanned and found.

properties.name: mManualMiningParticle
properties.comment: Particle to show when mining by hand

properties.name: mFactoryMiningParticle
properties.comment: Particle to show when mining with machine

properties.name: mDestroyedParticle
properties.comment: Particle to show when mining with machine

properties.name: mManualMiningAudioName
properties.comment: name of sound to play when mining by hand
